title: The Comparison Page
subtitle: Comparing cryptocurrency market prices across exchanges
body:
When using InterTrader, if you're not [searching for profitable trades](/user-guide/finding-profitable-cryptocurrency-pairs/ "Finding profitable cryptocurrency pairs: search and analysis") , a lot of your time will be spent on the comparison page, where you can see:

* Prices of a cryptocurrency pair across multiple exchanges
* Potential profit
* Orderbooks from the exchanges where the coin is listed

##
